member.name: M:Freya.Optics.Option.unsafe_``1
member.summary: A degenerate isomorphism from an 'a option to an 'a, where a non-Some value will result in a runtime error. This should only be used as part of optics where the form of the data can't be proven at compile time through a change in type, but can be known.

member.name: M:Freya.Optics.Option.ofResult``2(Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpResult{``0,``1})
member.summary: Returns the result if successful, otherwise None.

member.name: M:Freya.Optics.Option.ofChoice``2(Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpChoice{``0,``1})
member.summary: A function Choice -> Option, effectively discarding the second state.
